title: Muslim Stories for Children
description: 14 Stories for Muslim Children on 7 Audio CDs:CD1: Love at Home - A Great Friend of ChildrenCD2: Stories of the Caliphs - Love All CreaturesCD3: The Persecutor Comes Home - The Brave BoyCD4: The Long Search - The Longing HeartCD5: The Kingdom of Justice - Love Your GodCD6: Love Your Brother, Love Your Neighbour - The Desert ChiefCD7: The Wise Poet - Stories of the Broken Idol and the Jewish RabbiIntroduced by Ibrahim B. Hewitt
author: Khurram Murad
